question: Which SUV vehicle was launched in India recently?
explanation: The new Jeep Compass SUV has been launched in India with prices starting at a very competitive Rs. 14.95 lakh for the entry-level Sports petrol and goes up to Rs. 20.65 lakh (ex-showroom) for the range-topping diesel. The Jeep Compass will be retailed out of 50 sales outlets including FCA and Jeep Destination store across 47 cities.
